description: This course introduces basic techniques for performance on the violin, viola, cello, and string bass. Additional topics include: pedagogical techniques, tools, and literature; teaching repertoire; and instrument care. Prerequisite: permission of instructor required for students not majoring in theory/composition or music education. Offered annually in the fall semester.
name: String Methods
prerequisites: permission of instructor required for students not majoring in theory/composition or music education. Offered annually in the fall semester.
